commit message:
Begin work on 2.0-rc2

Hiding status icon (GONE) instead of just making it invisibile

Signed-off-by: Daniele Ricci <daniele.athome@gmail.com>

Mark message senders as registered users

Signed-off-by: Daniele Ricci <daniele.athome@gmail.com>

Be sure to extra-check for password presence

Signed-off-by: Daniele Ricci <daniele.athome@gmail.com>

Be sure to send ACKs even when connection is unstable

Signed-off-by: Daniele Ricci <daniele.athome@gmail.com>

Cache also user status while syncing

Signed-off-by: Daniele Ricci <daniele.athome@gmail.com>

Update users table on sync and lookup

Signed-off-by: Daniele Ricci <daniele.athome@gmail.com>

Display status message after 5 seconds of last seen

User can switch between the two texts by clicking the title bar

Signed-off-by: Daniele Ricci <daniele.athome@gmail.com>

Commenting test code

Signed-off-by: Daniele Ricci <daniele.athome@gmail.com>
